api_list.api_description: Send an email containing a link to manage your alerts.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: A valid email address with existing alerts.

api_list.api_description: Fetch a specific dad joke by its ID.

required_parameters.name: joke_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the joke to fetch.

optional_parameters.name: accept
optional_parameters.description: The format to accept the joke in.

query: I received an email to manage my game alerts. How do I access it? Also, there's a specific dad joke I've been wanting to share with friends, can you retrieve it for me?
